content: Southeast Asian regional library organisation (est. 1970) The **Congress of Southeast Asian Librarians (CONSAL)** is an international library organization that connects libraries throughout the [Southeastern Asia region](/wiki/Southeastern_Asia). It was founded in 1970 in Singapore with the goal of supporting and growing [information and library science](/wiki/Information_and_library_science) throughout the region. ## History The formation of CONSAL was inspired by the creation of the [ASEAN](/wiki/ASEAN) organizations in 1970. It has long connections to the national libraries of all its member countries, including the [National Library of Malaysia](/wiki/National_Library_of_Malaysia), [National Library](/wiki/National_Library,_Singapore) in Singapore, [National Library of the Philippines](/wiki/National_Library_of_the_Philippines), [National Library of Vietnam](/wiki/National_Library_of_Vietnam), [National Library of Thailand](/wiki/National_Library_of_Thailand), [National Library of Myanmar](/wiki/National_Library_of_Myanmar), [National Library of Cambodia](/wiki/National_Library_of_Cambodia), [National Library of Laos](/wiki/National_Library_of_Laos), [National Library of Indonesia](/wiki/National_Library_of_Indonesia), and many other public and private library institutions. ## Members and affiliates CONSAL includes libraries, schools, associations, and organizations across [Brunei](/wiki/Brunei), [Cambodia](/wiki/Cambodia), [Indonesia](/wiki/Indonesia), [Laos](/wiki/Laos), [Malaysia](/wiki/Malaysia), [Myanmar](/wiki/Myanmar), [Philippines](/wiki/Philippines), [Singapore](/wiki/Singapore), [Thailand](/wiki/Thailand), and [Vietnam](/wiki/Vietnam). [Timor-Leste](/wiki/Timor-Leste) began joining CONSAL meetings as an observer and participant, but not an official member, in 2011 at the CONSAL XV. ### Notable members ### Leadership #### Main Committee Chair Ghazali Mohamed Fadzil (2025) #### Secretary General Chin Loy Jyoon (2022-2025) Dr. Nor Edzan Che Nasir (2022-2025) Ramachandran Rasu Naidu (2000-2003) ## Conferences, awards, and programs CONSAL typically holds a General Conference & Meeting for its members every three years, with each member country alternating the role as host. The 20th CONSAL Meeting will be held in Singapore in 2028.
